page.title: 17Entertainment
page.content: We have one main theatre in Chesham, Elgiva Hall, which has events ranging from extravagant roller-discos and displays, to theatrical amusements and plays.In the foyer there are several seats and a bar where you can buy a meal and a drink in the day.It is equipped with 2 changing rooms and a ticket checkout.It is very popular throughout Chesham and seats roughly 300 people in the main hall.It also has a big orchestra pit where bands play.It has a wide variety of curtains and different groups work at the scenery and put on shows.Sometimes there is a display of cars and they are driven into the hall.The seats can be taken up and the stage can be enlarged.There are different types of shows put on such as music or even recent films.
